subject: Scholarships and Fellowships
College Athletics
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: As the antitrust case heads to appeal, the N.C.A.A., athletic directors and university presidents are left to wrestle with what sort of change is permissible and what is not.
snippet: As the antitrust case heads to appeal, the N.C.A.A., athletic directors and university presidents are left to wrestle with what sort of change is permissible and what is not.
